sqlMap.select: SELECT A.ISAUTH, A.FID, A.FNAME, A.ENAME, A.LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.NLDNO, A.MOBILE, A.PHONE1, D.BASNAME AS IMAGEHOST, A.FILENAME, C.BASNAME AS CATEGORY, A.REMARK, A.EMAIL, A.CLOSEDDAY, A.OPENDAY, A.WEBSITE, A.INFO, A.QRCODE, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, S.BASNAME AS SERVICETYPE, P.BASNAME AS PLACETYPE, A.FULLADDRESS, A.SIDO, A.GUGUN, A.DONG, A.NEWADDRESS FROM PLACE A LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD S ON A.SERVICETYPE = S.BASECD AND S.GRPCD = 'SERVICETYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD P ON A.PLACETYPE = P.BASECD AND P.GRPCD = 'PLACETYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD C ON A.CATEGORY = C.BASECD AND C.GRPCD = 'CATEGORY' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD D ON A.IMAGEHOST = D.BASECD AND D.GRPCD = 'MEDIA' WHERE A.ISAUTH ='Y' ORDER BY A.FID DESC LIMIT 1 ,#limit#

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.EID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.ISAUTH, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE, A.EDITDATE, D.BASNAME AS IMAGEHOST, A.FILEPATH, B.FNAME, B.FULLADDRESS FROM PLACEEVENT A INNER JOIN PLACE B ON A.FID = B.FID LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD D ON A.IMAGEHOST = D.BASECD AND D.GRPCD = 'MEDIA' WHERE A.ISDELETE = 'N' AND A.ISAUTH = 'Y' ORDER BY A.STARTDATE DESC LIMIT 1,#limit#
